West End Statistics was founded by Vitaly Druker in 2019 and has helped clients with clinical study design, study analysis and research. West End Statistics (WES) specializes in complex designs that require simulated data. WES focuses on communicating effectively with clients and assissting them with making design decisions that give them the best chance of meeting their goals.
